video.title: Dance Moms: Collection
video.synopsis: A group of young dancers' mothers spar with each other and no-nonsense teacher and studio owner Abby Lee Miller in this drama-filled reality show.

episodes.synopsis: Pittsburgh dance guru Abby Lee prepares to travel to Phoenix with her young dance troupe and their moms for the start of a new competition season.
episodes.title: The Competition Begins

episodes.synopsis: Stress levels run high at ALDC when a Broadway casting director arrives to audition the girls and watch the company's annual moms and kids recital.
episodes.title: When Stars Collide

episodes.synopsis: Sparks fly when Abby assigns Nia a solo inspired by drag queen Laquifa, and Holly accuses Abby of typecasting Nia in stereotypical roles.
episodes.title: She's a Fighter

episodes.synopsis: After a series of setbacks, Abby prepares her dancers for a national competition, pitting duet against duet in a stress-filled showdown.
episodes.title: It All Ends Here

episodes.synopsis: Eager to shake things up after Vivi-Anne's departure, Abby holds open auditions, then questions the busy Holly about her dedication.
episodes.title: Everyone's Replaceable

episodes.synopsis: When Brooke tries out for cheerleading, leaving her group in a lurch the day before a competition, Abby must decide whether to pull the routine.
episodes.title: Brooke's Turning Point

episodes.synopsis: With the ALDC headed to Miami to compete, Abby prepares a beach-themed group routine. But Paige needs foot surgery, leaving an open spot to fill.
episodes.title: Miami Heat Wave

episodes.synopsis: Abby's mettle is tested when top dancer Maddie freezes while performing at the Regionals in New York, and Cathy's Candy Apples show up to compete.
episodes.title: Abbygeddon

episodes.synopsis: Abby forces Maddie into a tough situation after covertly entering her in two Star Power competitions, then brings back Payton when Brooke drops out.
episodes.title: Maddie Has a Secret

episodes.synopsis: To select dancers for the upcoming Nationals, Abby assigns every girl a solo except Maddie, who must prove to Abby she still has the drive to compete.
episodes.title: Solo Fever

episodes.synopsis: Before ALDC heads to New Jersey to perform a number about love, the moms take Abby speed dating, while Jill gets Kendall private lessons to outdo Nia.
episodes.title: All's Fair in Love and War

episodes.synopsis: In New York, Abby prepares to co-host "The View" while her girls perform, and must decide whether to replace the injured Mackenzie with Asia.
episodes.title: The View from the Top

episodes.synopsis: Determined to best rival Abby and rebuild her team after a tough loss, Cathy recruits new dancers, including an old friend who's ALDC's nemesis.
episodes.title: An Apple a Day Keeps Abby Away

episodes.synopsis: Abby shocks the troupe when she shows up with her dead dog, Broadway Baby, who's now stuffed. Meanwhile, Kelly plots with the other moms.
episodes.title: The Dancing Dead

episodes.synopsis: When Abby goes AWOL, Kelly sneaks Brooke back into ALDC, jeopardizing Payton's position on the team. Maddie helps an ailing girl's dream come true.
episodes.title: Gone, Abby Gone
